hero.title: About Momai Brass
hero.subtitle: Engineering Precision Since 1993
hero.description: Momai Brass is a leading precision components manufacturer with three decades of expertise in delivering high-quality metal parts. We combine advanced CNC technology with deep engineering knowledge to serve critical industries with exceptional manufacturing solutions.

meta.title: Momai Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 1993
meta.description: 30 years of precision manufacturing expertise, delivering high-quality metal components for automotive, pneumatic, and electrical sectors using advanced CNC technology.

items.title: Company Foundation
items.description: Established in Rajkot with a vision to provide high-precision metal components to emerging industrial sectors

items.title: First CNC Machine Investment
items.description: Expanded manufacturing capabilities by investing in first advanced CNC machining technology

items.title: Quality Certification Achievement
items.description: Obtained ISO 9001 certification, establishing rigorous quality management standards

items.title: Jamnagar Branch Establishment
items.description: Expanded operations with new manufacturing facility in Jamnagar to serve growing market demand

items.title: Technology Modernization
items.description: Upgraded to 40+ advanced CNC machines, enhancing precision and production capacity

items.title: Advanced CNC Machining Center
items.description: State-of-the-art CNC machining capabilities for producing complex metal components with micron-level precision

items.content: Momai Brass is a premier precision components manufacturer with 30 years of expertise in producing high-quality metal parts for automotive, pneumatic, hydraulic, and electrical sectors. Our advanced CNC technology and commitment to quality enable us to deliver exceptional components that meet the most demanding industrial standards.
highlights: Precision Parts in Brass, Stainless Steel, Aluminum, Copper

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Collaborative design phase using advanced CAD/CAM technologies to develop precise component blueprints

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Carefully selecting optimal materials including brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and copper based on component requirements

items.title: Precision Machining
items.description: Utilizing advanced CNC machines to manufacture components with micron-level accuracy

items.title: Comprehensive Quality Control
items.description: Rigorous inspection and testing to ensure every component meets stringent quality standards

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Advanced surface finishing techniques including deburring, polishing, and specialized coatings

items.title: Precise Packaging & Delivery
items.description: Careful packaging and timely delivery ensuring components arrive in perfect condition
